tika-vin07t34:2: 357. Vattakkhandhake pattharitabbanti ātape pattharitabbaṁ. Pāḷiyaṁ abhivādāpetabboti vandanatthāya vassaṁ pucchanena navako sayameva vandatīti vuttaṁ. Nilloketabboti oloketabbo.
tika-vin07t34:5_1: upari paccattharaṇaṁ datvā dānampi senāsanapaññāpanamevāti dassento āha “papphoṭetvā
tika-vin07t34:8_0: 362.Pañcame nisinneti anumodanatthāya nisinne. Na mahātherassa bhāro hotīti anumodakaṁ
tika-vin07t34:8_1: āgametuṁ na bhāro. Ajjhiṭṭhova āgametabboti attanā ajjhiṭṭhehi bhikkhūhi anumodanteyeva
tika-vin07t34:11_1: bhikkhū netvā bhojenti. Āsanesu satīti nisīdanaṭṭhānesu santesu. Idaṁ, bhante, āsanaṁ
tika-vin07t34:11_2: uccanti āsanne samabhūmibhāge paññattaṁ therāsanena samakaṁ āsanaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ,
tika-vin07t34:11_3: therāsanato pana uccatare āpucchitvāpi nisīdituṁ na vaṭṭati. Yadi taṁ āsannampi nīcataraṁ
tika-vin07t34:11_4: hoti, anāpucchāpi nisīdituṁ vaṭṭati. Mahātherasseva āpattīti āsanena paṭibāhanāpattiyā
tika-vin07t34:11_5: āpatti. Avattharitvāti pārutasaṅghāṭiṁ avattharitvā, anukkhipitvāti attho.
tika-vin07t34:12_0: Pāḷiyaṁ “ubhohi hatthehi…pe… odano paṭiggahetabbo”ti idaṁ hatthatale vā pacchipiṭṭhiādidussaṇṭhitādhāre
tika-vin07t34:12_1: vā pattaṁ ṭhapetvā odanassa gahaṇakāle pattassa apatanatthāya vuttaṁ, susajjite pana
tika-vin07t34:12_2: ādhāre pattaṁ ṭhapetvā ekena hatthena taṁ parāmasitvāpi odanaṁ paṭiggahetuṁ vaṭṭati
tika-vin07t34:12_3: eva. Ubhohi hatthehi…pe… udakaṁ paṭiggahetabbanti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin07t34:13_0: Hatthadhovanaudakanti bhojanāvasāne udakaṁ. Tenāha “pānīyaṁ pivitvā hatthā dhovitabbā”ti.
tika-vin07t34:13_1: Tena pariyosāne dhovanameva paṭikkhittaṁ, bhojanantare pana pānīyapivanādinā nayena
tika-vin07t34:13_2: hatthaṁ dhovitvā puna bhuñjituṁ vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Potthakesu pana “pānīyaṁ pivitvā
tika-vin07t34:13_3: hatthā na dhovitabbā”ti likhanti, taṁ purimavacanena na sameti pariyosāne udakasseva
tika-vin07t34:13_4: “hatthadhovanaudaka”nti vuttattā. Sace manussā dhovatha, bhantetiādi niṭṭhitabhattaṁ
tika-vin07t34:13_5: nisinnaṁ theraṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Dhure dvārasamīpe.
tika-vin07t34:16: 366. Pāḷiyaṁ ṭhāpeti vāti tiṭṭha bhanteti vadanti.
tika-vin07t34:17_0: 367.Atthi, bhante, nakkhattapadānīti nakkhattapadavisayāni ñātāni atthi, assayujādinakkhattaṁ
tika-vin07t34:17_1: jānāthāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “na jānāma, āvuso”ti. Atthi, bhante, disābhāganti etthāpi
tika-vin07t34:17_2: eseva nayo. Kenajja, bhante, yuttanti kena nakkhattena cando yuttoti attho.
tika-vin07t34:18: 369.Aṅgaṇeti abbhokāse. Evameva paṭipajjitabbanti uddesadānādi āpucchitabbanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t34:19: 374.Nibaddhagamanatthāyāti attanova nirantaragamanatthāya. Ūhaditāti ettha hada-dhātussa vaccavissajjanatthatāyāha “bahi vaccamakkhitā”ti.
